data.message: His career isn't over. Walk on Water was a beautiful song. Its not just about the rhythm or the beat, but the lyrics. It was poetry more than anything. But most of you are simple minded and probably angry about his views towards our current president. Eminem is one of, if not the most revered and talented MC's in the field.

replies.message: A true artist would not diss and belittle fans that dont agree with his views!
Carlos Gonzales he's been doing that for almost 20 years. And now its a problem? Or are the people who support our current president just that sensitive?
Loved the song until I heard the R word in it 😕
Yesssss, perfectly said 🙌🏼🙌🏼

CarlosGonzales a real artist dont give a fuck what anyone thinks and do whatever he want, you can like it or not. If someone is crying over trump, then he should rethink life anyway. i would never give a damn if someone would insult  our president. They even could gangbang him with 24 people and i wouldn't mind.
Exactly
Exactly! Tired of these fake fans

Eminem is entitled to his own opinions and thoughts. No different than anyone else in this country. If you disagree with Eminem and don’t like his opinions or him in general,that’s your problem,not his. Also,I think that because Eminem is so complex lyrically his messages and song meanings can be hard to understand sometimes. He also has a couple songs (The Monster and Without Me most notably) where the beats and instruments cover up the message of the song. With Walk On Water,neither of those is an issue. Anyone could figure out what Walk On Water is about with one listen. I like that about the song,as well as the content.
Good point, and the song has lyrics talking about his retirement. Simple minded pretty much answers the question to what I just posted above.
Notice Trump hasn’t responded? He wouldn’t dare.
It should be about rhythm and beat since that’s what the revival medicine advertisement is all about. Being able to cure lack of rhythm.
Well said! A real fan gets it.
Jessica Peterson the R word 😂😂seriously?

I agree on his talent. but celebrities she stick to entertainment.  not political agendas.  and to draw "a line in the sand"  on the very people that made him who he is " his fans" is kinda fucked up.
Kenneth Price-jones he did the same thing when Bush was president. Why is it a problem now?
Did you just say the song has nothing to do with the rhythm or Beat? Do you know how music works? LOL

Jessica Peterson retarded ? He wasn’t making fun of anybody or calling anybody retarded in the song anyways, would you prefer him use the word stupid ? Or dumb ? They wouldn’t have rhymed or fit the syllables but yeah. This is one of his most least offensive songs
It;s poetry it's not music.

Erich bro, he said its not JUST about rhythm and beat. Hes saying the music and beat aren't a big factor, for it is not even a full blown beat, just a little bit of rhythm to speak his poem to. It's a spoken poem more than a song. Rap artists (MCs rather) with poetic talent sometimes do these kind of "songs" as an intro or intermission on an album. I guarantee that's how he's going to use this one
Gregory, it's not a full blown song. Simply a spoken poem. The rhythm and beat will be on the rest of the album
Well said 💯
I like Eminem always will but he could have picked someone better than Beyonce
He's entitled to an opinion of his own but so am I. It's the line in the sand that's made people angry
Parik Sayadi read this comment 🙂
